Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute at 95th/Woodlawn
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove, 87th, Stony Island and 93rd: due to, street blockage near95th/Woodlawn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove, 87th, Stony Island and 93rd: due to, street blockage near95th/Woodlawn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #51 51st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 51st/Whipple
ShortDescription: WB 51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, California, 47th, Kedzie, then resume their normal route on 51st, due to a street blockage near 51st/Whipple

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, California, 47th, Kedzie, then resume their normal route on 51st, due to a street blockage near 51st/Whipple.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
